result.execSummary:
Rovell Lenale Drew was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Rovell Lenale Drew was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.dispoDesc: Defendant extradited to Arizona/defendant on hold from probation.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Rovell Lenale Drew

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Rovell Lenale Drew not in court.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant has been turned over to the State of Arizona.  On motion of the state, Court ordered case closed.

Defendant Rovell Lenale Drew in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Rovell Lenale Drew in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  State of Arizona came to pick Defendant up.  Defendant not released due to sitting on probation hold.  DEFENDANT REMAINS REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.  Case is adjourned for Status conference scheduled for May 8, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Rovell Lenale Drew in court with attorney Alejandro A. Lockwood.  Defendant Rovell Lenale Drew in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Moroney, Branch 20.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of rights and right to file a Writ of Habeas Corpus.  Court found the defendant is the person wanted in the State of Arizona.  Defendant waived extradition.  Signed Waiver of Extradition received and filed.  Court ordered the defendant remanded into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.  Status conference scheduled for April 23, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
